channel.title: How to change ::lvl xp
channel.description:
How do you change the ::lvl xp. It's only 1M
Also, my starter is 15M, but when you log out and back in you can get more starter? Help please! :)

item.title: How to change ::lvl xp
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:3, topic:298521”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=394918.msg2934885#msg2934885 date=1251499163]

if(command.equals("lvl')) { String[] cmd = command.split(" "); int levelid = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); int xp = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]); addSkillXP(levelid,xp); }
[/quote]

Or:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“setlevel”)) {
String[] token = command.split(" ");
int lvl = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
int lvl2 = Integer.parseInt(token[2]);

for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) {
	if (playerEquipment[i] > 0) {
		sendMessage("You cannot change your stats while wearing equipment!");
		return;
	}
}
if (lvl2 > 99) {
	sendMessage("You cannot change your stats higher than 99!");
	return;
}
playerXP[lvl] = getXPForLevel(lvl2 + 1);
playerLevel[lvl] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[lvl]);
setSkillLevel(lvl, playerLevel[lvl], playerXP[lvl]);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}[/code]

It makes it a lot simpler :). Usage - ::setlevel skillid level[/quote]

can’t be fucked to write it all out.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change ::lvl xp
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:2, topic:298521”]if(command.equals("lvl')) { String[] cmd = command.split(" "); int levelid = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); int xp = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]); addSkillXP(levelid,xp); }[/quote]

Or:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“setlevel”)) {
String[] token = command.split(" ");
int lvl = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
int lvl2 = Integer.parseInt(token[2]);

for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) {
	if (playerEquipment[i] > 0) {
		sendMessage("You cannot change your stats while wearing equipment!");
		return;
	}
}
if (lvl2 > 99) {
	sendMessage("You cannot change your stats higher than 99!");
	return;
}
playerXP[lvl] = getXPForLevel(lvl2 + 1);
playerLevel[lvl] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[lvl]);
setSkillLevel(lvl, playerLevel[lvl], playerXP[lvl]);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}[/code]

It makes it a lot simpler :). Usage - ::setlevel skillid level
